title: Heroes of Might and Magic (Complete)
description:
(1990) King's Bounty
(1993) King's Bounty 2 (Russian Public Domain)
(1997) King's Bounty 3 (Russian Public Domain)

(1995) Heroes of Might and Magic - A Strategic Quest
(King's Bounty 1 is included on this disc in the Heroes Folder and in a seperate .7z archive)

(1998) Heroes of Might and Magic II - Gold (ALL Expansions)
Heroes of Might and Magic II: The Price of Loyalty
Open Source SDL implementation (Pre-Alpha)

(2000) Heroes of Might and Magic III - Complete (ALL Expansions)
Heroes of Might and Magic III: Armageddon's Blade
Heroes of Might and Magic III: The Shadow of Death
Heroes of Might and Magic III: In The Wake of the Gods (Fan Expansion)

(2001) Heroes Chronicles - Complete (ALL 8 Episodes)
Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wasteland
Heroes Chronicles: Conquest of the Underworld
Heroes Chronicles: Revolt of the Beastmasters
Heroes Chronicles: The World Tree
Heroes Chronicles: The Fiery Moon
Heroes Chronicles: Masters of the Elements
Heroes Chronicles: Clash of the Dragons
Heroes Chronicles: The Sword of Frost

(2004) Heroes of Might and Magic IV - Complete (ALL Expansions)
Heroes of Might and Magic IV: The Gathering Storm
Heroes of Might and Magic IV: Winds of War
Heroes of Might and Magic IV: Equilibris - Balance Mod (Fan Expansion)

(2006) Heroes of Might and Magic V - Complete (ALL Expansions)
Heroes of Might and Magic V - Hammers of Fate
Heroes of Might and Magic V Tribes Of The East (Standalone Expansion)


# Image: Full CD (various formats) cept for King's Bounty Series (King's Bounty 1 IS on the HoMM 1 CD and a separate .7z archive)

# Patch: All Games should be updated to the newest patch already, but I included EVERY patch known to man just in case.

# Documents: PDF Manuals for almost every games (None for the Chronicles series or King's Bounty 2 & 3), Quick reference cards, Tech Trees etc.

# Hints & Cheats: FAQ and Cheats for almost every game.

# Extras: Demos, Movies, Editors, Extra Maps, Open Source SDL HOMM II, Mods and Campaigns, TONS of Heroes IV Goodies... TONS!



System requirements for HoMM 1-4:

Minimum CPU: 80486 - Pentium II 400 MHz
Minimum OS Class: MS-DOS - Windows 98
Minimum RAM: 8 MB - 128 MB
Minimum CD-ROM Drive Speed: 2X - 4X
Minimum DirectX Version: None - 8.0
Input Devices Supported: Keyboard, Mouse
Multiplayer Options: Internet (TCP/IP), LAN, Modem, Null-modem cable, Hotseat
Number of Players: 1-4 (offline), 4 (online)
Multiplayer Game Modes: Bots, Free-for-all
Miscellaneous Attributes: Same/Split-Screen Multiplayer


System Requirements for HoMM 5:

Supported OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista
Processor: Pentium 4 or AMD AthlonTM 1.5 GHz (Pentium 4 2.4 GHz recommended)
RAM: 512 MB (1 GB recommended)
Video Card: DirectX 9 compliant w/ 64MB RAM (128 MB recommended)
Sound Card: DirectX compliant
DirectX Version: 9.0 or higher
Hard Drive Space: 2+ GB
Multiplayer: Broadband Internet connection
